Class Arena

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Arena

  • public class Arena
extends javafx.application.Application
    Arena.java deals with the game arena, it records the actions on UI and performs the computation.
    Since:
    2019-07-06
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    iknoor

      • checkWinner

        public boolean checkWinner(Player p1,
                           Player p2)
        Function to check the winner of the game after every hit by player/computer.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player who has been hit.
        p2 - Player who did hit.
        Returns:
        true if there is a winner of the game i.e. all ships are down else return false.

      • calcScore

        public java.lang.String calcScore(long elapsedtime,
                                  Player human)
        Function to calculate score for each game play.
        Parameters:
        elapsedtime - - time taken by player for the entire game play
        human - human player object
        Returns:
        the calculated score in the form of a String.
